ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] Cantera future releases

Stefan,

Funny you should ask.  I'm working today on preparing the next  
release, version 1.7.0.  It should be released in a day or two.

Dave


On Nov 2, 2006, at 8:37 AM, spdomin wrote:

> Greetings,
>
> Could someone comment on the time frame for the next Cantera  
> release? Our team is successfully using the latest development  
> version, however, we would like to move to a stable released version.
>
> Also, what is the required manner in which the use of Cantera  
> should be displayed if, for example, an application code is using  
> Cantera as a TPL? Currently, we simply have a list of all TPLs that  
> our application uses with version number. Should we include  
> something more?
>
> With best wishes,
>
> Stefan 


--Apple-Mail-1--405409143
